title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy dish with mixed vegetables tossed in a savory sauce.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: Tender beef cooked in a creamy mushroom sauce served over noodles.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A fresh salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: A simple yet delicious pizza topped with tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.

title: Shrimp Scampi
summary: Succulent shrimp cooked in a garlic, butter, and white wine sauce, served over pasta.

title: Vegetarian Chili
summary: A hearty and flavorful chili made with beans, vegetables, and spices.

title: Pancakes
summary: Fluffy pancakes perfect for breakfast, served with syrup and fresh berries.

title: Classic Burger
summary: A juicy beef patty with lettuce, tomato, cheese, and your favorite condiments.
